text:
"The Late Show with Stephen Colbert" is an American late-night talk show hosted by Stephen Colbert on CBS. It is the second version of the "Late Show" <nowiki/>franchise, following the retirement of original "Late Show" host David Letterman. Jonathan Batiste is the bandleader.
The show premiered on September 8, 2015. Colbert had previously hosted "The Colbert Report" on Comedy Central.
